name: F-1 Grand Prix: Part III
overview: A top-down Formula One racing game and the third entry in Video System's F-1 Grand Prix series. Like its predecessors, it carries the license to feature real-life F1 cars and teams from FOCA and Fuji TV (which held the rights to show F1 racing on Japanese television). The game features a story mode that allows the player to upgrade their vehicle and acquire sponsors between races.
